nodes.text: The Star Wars Index is a compilation of information regarding Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope in great detail constructed by Pablo Hidalgo. Last updated in 2000, the project was to include the remaining movies, but has since stopped due to his direct involvement with Lucasfilm.
The site also contains a gallery of Pablo's original Star Wars artwork.
Items, characters, and even filming goofs pointed out in the Index have been and continue to be used for the Visual Guides at StarWars.com.
